title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, objectives, and requirements. Conduct research on existing RFC search engines and identify areas for improvement. Gather input from potential users and stakeholders.

title: System Architecture Design (Revised)
description: Design the overall system architecture for an advanced RFC search engine, focusing on components for natural language processing, indexing, and search. Define data models, APIs, and integration points while ensuring scalability, maintainability, performance optimization, and consideration of edge cases, error handling, security aspects, compliance with relevant standards and regulations. To enhance the review process, include a high-level system diagram and a detailed description for each component, along with their interaction and data flow.

title: Natural Language Processing (NLP) Module
description: Develop the NLP module responsible for understanding the context and semantics of user queries and RFC content.

title: Indexing and Search Engine
description: Implement the indexing system for RFC documents and the search engine capable of handling semantic queries.

title: User Interface and Experience
description: Design and develop the user interface and experience for the search engine, including input fields, result presentation, and advanced search options.

title: Data Ingestion and Management
description: Implement a system for ingesting and managing RFC documents, including parsing, indexing, and updating mechanisms.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop comprehensive test plans and test cases to ensure the quality and accuracy of the search engine. Conduct manual and automated testing.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Implement security measures to protect user data and ensure compliance with relevant regulations and standards.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment environment, including infrastructure provisioning, continuous integration, and continuous deployment pipelines.

title: Documentation and User Support
description: Create comprehensive documentation for users, administrators, and developers. Establish user support channels and processes.
